item.title: Towards Robust Visual Tracking for Unmanned Aerial Vehicle with Tri-Attentional Correlation Filters
item.description:
Comparison between baseline KCC tracker and the proposed TACF tracker

	year={2020},

item.title: BiCF: Learning Bidirectional Incongruity-Aware Correlation Filter for Efficient UAV Object Tracking
item.description:
Comparison between discriminative correlation filter (DCF) and the proposed BiCF

item.title: Sample Purification-Aware Correlation Filters for UAV Tracking with Cooperative Deep Features
item.description: Comparison between traditional CF-based and proposed SPCF tracker
